entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
